name: Self-Healing System Index

sequences.name: Parse Production Telemetry
sequences.description: Parse production logs and extract telemetry events

sequences.description: Detect performance, behavioral, coverage, and error anomalies

sequences.description: Diagnose root cause of detected anomalies

sequences.name: Deploy Fix

sequences.name: Track Effectiveness
